svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Comparing the share of men and women who are smoking, 2015
Women and men 15 and over who smoke any form of tobacco, including cigarettes, cigars, pipes or any other
smoked tobacco products.Data include daily and non-daily or occasional smoking.
Share of women who are smoking
Share of men who are smoking
